|ram1type = LPDDR4 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = Micron;MT53E256M16D1DS-046 WT:B; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_none = true |oui = 68:B6:91
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->

|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->

|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = SDIO/UART |rad1chip1 = MediaTek;MT7653BSN; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = none |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 433 |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== "30-005605" and "REV 01" are silkscreened on main board.
{{See also|Amazon Echo Devices}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[MediaTek]] MT8512B @2.0GHz :Dual-core ARM (Cortex-A53) :Amazon AZ1 Neural Edge *Storage: 512MB (SPI NAND) Flash *Memory: 512MB (LPDDR4) RAM *Wi-Fi: [[MediaTek]] MT7653BSN (SDIO) :802.11abgn/ac 2.4/5GHz + BT 5.0 *Power Source: 12V 1.25A via barrel
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.pcmag.com/reviews/amazon-echo-dot-with-clock-4th-generation ''Amazon Echo Dot With Clock (4th Gen) Review'' on '''PC Mag'''] *[https://www.techradar.com/reviews/amazon-echo-dot-with-clock-2020-review ''Amazon Echo Dot with Clock (2020) review'' on '''TechRadar'''] *[https://www.androidcentral.com/amazon-echo-dot-and-echo-dot-clock-4th-gen-review ''Amazon Echo Dot & Echo Dot with Clock (4th Gen) review'' on '''Android Central''']
